name: Art and Design
aboutCourse:
* A highly practical subject and one in which research skills and ownership of ideas are very important aspects. Looking at new ways of working and exploring different media.
* Delivering new skills, as well as refining the skills already in existence, working alongside enthusiastic students and sharing work, ideas and excitement.
* Experimenting with new materials and different techniques whilst looking constantly at the ways both artists from the past and young artists today achieve their results.
interviewProcess:
There is an interview at the school as well as a short teaching activity for which you will have planning time. You will teach a group of students and be observed. There will also be a subject interview and a written task. 

Tutors from Wolverhampton University will also be part of the interview process. 

Visits prior to interview are encouraged please contact the school directly to arrange this.
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
Students undertake their placement at one school, there are opportunities to visit other schools and also there is a week in a Primary school . 

Age range - 11- 16 years. 

The Telford partnership schools are in the Telford area.
personalQualities: The Telford Partnership encourages applicants who are passionate about teaching. We are looking to recruit people who we believe can make a real difference to children's learning. We are looking for candidates that will fit naturally into our schools.
otherRequirements:
Original copies of Educational qualifications.
Enhanced DBS 
Health declaration
